assessment_item.title: 7QNHTRQ12 டின்டலைசேசன் _____ என்றும் அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

டின்டலைசேசன் _____ என்றும் அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பின்ன நுண்ணுயிர் நீக்கமுறை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1708"},{"text":"

பாஸ்ச்சுரைஷேசன்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1718"},{"text":"

கொதித்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1723"},{"text":"

இவற்றில் எதுவும் இல்லை
